## Overview

This folder contains past Numeracy assessments for NCEA CAA (Computer Adaptive Assessment) Level 1 in New Zealand.

## Contents

- Past tests from 2023-2025
- Practice materials and resources
- Reference documents

## File Naming Convention

Files should be named using the format: `NCEA_Numeracy_L1_YYYY-MM-DD.pdf`
